message.content:
cs.CL, cs.SI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.CY 

This paper deals with the problem of hate speech detection on social media, specifically Twitter. The proposed solution involves the use of deep neural networks and word embeddings. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CL (Computation and Language), which deals with natural language processing and machine learning. The paper also involves the use of background information, which falls under the category of cs.SI (Social and Information Networks). The use of deep neural networks falls under cs.LG (Machine Learning), and the paper also involves information retrieval techniques, which falls under cs.IR (Information Retrieval). Finally, the paper deals with the problem of unbalanced datasets, which falls under cs.CY (Computers and Society).
